label: Umbrellas
description: Products designed to protect individuals from rain and sun.
intents: Find a durable umbrella for windy weather.
Purchase a stylish umbrella as a fashion accessory.
Buy an umbrella for a specific event or occasion.
Find an umbrella with unique or fun designs.
Purchase an umbrella for sun protection.
Buy an umbrella as a gift for someone.
Find an umbrella that won't turn inside out in the wind.
Purchase an umbrella that is compact and easy to carry.
Buy an umbrella that is affordable.
Find an umbrella that is high quality and long-lasting.
